title: how does one go about reporting an elo booster?
body: I have played against what me and multiple players think to be a high level player above our league (gold) and at the end of the game they wrote in chat about getting a high level challenger elo boost. anyway to report said thing or person? the support page doesnt do much help for it.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet in this situation would be to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) about the user in question, provide as much information as possible about the infraction (A screenshot would be lovely).

They will forward the information on to the correct team to be looked into, you will however not  hear anything further about the status of the investigation for privacy reasons.
